Development starting again at April

published 24 Mar 2005

Hi developers,I just wanted to let you know that Timo and me are going to work onColumba again in April.Almost all important tasks on our roadmap are finished. Build/Releaseprocess is much easier now. So, hopefully we can do the RC3 release soon.http://columba.sourceforge.net/phpwiki/index.php/RoadmapAdditionally, I’m tinkering around with some CMS, so that the core teamcan help us keeping our website up-to-date easily. This was way to complexin the past.
